cast.overview: In the poverty-stricken favelas of Rio de Janeiro in the 1970s, two young men choose different paths. Rocket is a budding photographer who documents the increasing drug-related violence of his neighborhood, while José “Zé” Pequeno is an ambitious drug dealer diving into a dangerous life of crime.
cast.title: City of God

details.biography: Douglas Silva is a Brazilian actor. He is known for played Dadinho in the 2002 Brazilian film, City of God. He also played Acerola in the spin-off series City of Men and the 2007 film based on it. He became the first Brazilian actor to be nominated for the International Emmy Award.
details.name: Douglas Silva
details.place_of_birth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
